name: boom barrier systems
description:
dormakaba Boom Barrier is used to manage the flow of the Vehicle by allowing inside or halting. We offer a variety of Boom Lengths from 2.5m to 6m in one single barrier arm and for 7 to 10m we can offer 2 boom barriers with Synchronization to cover the exact length. Perfect running performance, achieved by electronic speed control and optimized mechanics, protects the motor and gear. An efficient drive concept with a powerful 24V BLDC gear and robust components ensures intensive operation with 100% duty cycle.


1Top cover made up of 2mm thickness sheet metal with powder coated. 
2 Housing is made up of 2mm thickness sheet metal with powder coated. 
3 BLDC 24V DC Motor 
4 Spring for balancing boom 
5 Control board 
6 Boom holding plate 
7 Emergency brake lever 
8 MCB 6A 
9 Floor fixing SS 304 plate

Standard Units DKB2500 DKB3000 DKB3500 DKB4000 DKB4500 DKB5000 DKB6000
Boom Length in mm 2500 3000 3500 4000 4500 5000 6000
Mechanism Automatic
Drive 24V BLDC Motor
Opening Closing Time 1.5 - 5 sec
Power Supply 230 V AC
Power Consumption 40 W
Frequency 50-60 Hz
Duty Cycle 100%
MCBF 5 million Cycles
Temperature -30 to +55 °C
Weight in Kg 60 61 61.5 62 62.5 63 65

name: Articulation of Boom Barrier
description: An articulated boom barrier is the most efficient and effective solution for controlling the movement of public and private vehicles and access to rest areas, even with heavy vehicular movement. The barrier is designed and manufactured with a casting process, so the parts are previsioned accurately and hence the stability of the barrier gate is assured. Boom gates are typically found at level crossings, drawbridges, parking facilities, checkpoints, and entrances to restricted areas. The boom barrier is aesthetically designed with a sleek and modern look. The articulated boom is designed for heavy usage in the parking industry and ensures a hassle-free operation for many years. Smooth boom movement with automatic slowdown. It has a 90° articulated boom mechanism. Maximum boom Length can go up to 5m.
subcategory: Boom barrier and physical security Products

name: Securo Plus - 6C
description:
Securo Plus 6C is designed for access control of passageways upto 6m. 
The linear boom-holder cabinet made of robust steel panels spray-painted to blend in perfectly into the most modern architectural urban contexts at the same time guaranteeing its reliability throughout time.
 Self-programmed boom barrier with an enhanced geared motor powered by 24V. Rigid boom in white spray-painted aluminium ø70mm. 
Complete with end caps and passive rubber safety edge. 
All mechanical components are mounted on a robust steel chassis and consist of a highly efficient, double reduction geared motor and an adjustable spring-loaded balancing system. 
Robust barrier designed to last long, complete with boom holder, warning lights built in to the cabinet and an external key operated manual system so as to avoid unauthorised manual operations. 
The integrated programmer allows encoder-controlled boom movement. 
The electronic control unit is completed by the anti-crush and “soft start” and “soft stop” functions. 
The control electronics has several stand-out characteristics with the progressive, calibrated management of the motor power, the possibility to adjust the maneuvering speed, the master/slave function allowing to synchronise two barriers working in unison.
subcategory: Boom barrier and physical security Products

name: Boom Barriers for special application
description:
Although technology offers variety of control systems, barriers remain the most convenient and the simplest solution to control parking access. Barriers with skirtings 2m each along boom length are ideal for preventing pedestrians, from getting underneath automatic barrier. Aspecial articulated boom consists of two parts for an overall length of 3m with rubber anti-shock protective edges. The cast aluminium joint, which markedly reduces the height during opening, makes it ideal for use in installations such as underground or basement car parking areas.






Three Station Push Button Mounted on wall or column in the vicinity of barrier with “Open / Emergency-Stop / Close” controls. Plastic housing IP 65




Traffic Light / Flashing Light They serve safety requirements & give visual signals for opening and closing impulse




Photocells The photocells are the safety sensors used to monitor the passageway in 2 different ways a) For safety, the boom will not be allowed to close as long on the IR boom is interrupted. b) While closing of boom if obstacle is detected, the boom will reopen automatically.




Key Selector Mounted on walls or columns in the vicinity of barrier with metal front, plastic back casing is ideal for unauthorised operations due to sleek lock arrangement & designated key.




Fixed Support / Mobile Support The barrier bar normally rests on fixed support to be installed on the ground. It can also rest on mobile support attached with the bar, which moves along with the bar and useful when two barriers are installed in opposite locations to cover large openings.




Magnetic Loop Detector Barrier automatically opens when a vehicle goes over the sensor fitted to the pavement. As a safety system, it detects the vehicle going past it and stops the bar from closing until the vehicle has gone through.

name: prinkler Sidewall 68* UL QR
description:
Description

NewAge make Standard Response & Standard Coverage Horizontal Sidewall Sprinkler is a thermosensitive glass bulb spray sprinkler available with different temperature rating to meet the design requirements. They are devised to (1) Provide an arc shaped water discharge pattern (2) For installation along a wall or the side of a beam and just under a smooth ceiling. They are the perfect choice instead of pendent or upright, when aesthtics is the concern. They are designed for use in light & ordinary hazard commercial occupancies such as Residential & Commercial buildings, Hotels, Hospitals, Banks, Malls, Theaters, Factories, Oil & Gas Plants, Chemical Plants, Etc.

name: Sprinkler Sidewall 68* UL QR
description:
Description

Safex Standard Response Spray Sprinklers are intended for use in the Sprinkler Systems designed in accordance with the standard installation rules recognized by the applicable listing or approval agency. They are available in Pendent, UprighHorizontal Sidewall Styles.

Safex Quick Response Spray Sprinklers are designed with a 3mm glass-bulb to react quicker at the specified temperatureThey are available in Pendent, Upright, Horizontal Sidewall Styles.

During a fire conditions, the thermal-sensitive liquid in the Glass Bulb expands, causing the bulb to shatter, releasing the button and spring seal assemblyWater flowing through the Sprinkler orifice strikes the Sprinkler deflector, forming a uniform spray pattern to extinguish or control the fire.

Standard and Quick Responders are designed for use in a wild range of applications including office buildings, libraries, hotels, restaurants, banks, band shells, theaters, factories, and storehouses.

name: Sprinkler Upright 68* K115 UL
description:
Description

The Series TY-B, 2.8, 5.6, and 8.0 K-factor, Upright and Pendent Sprinklers described in this data sheet are standard response - standard coverage, decorative 5 mm glass bulb type spray sprinklers designed for use in light, ordinary, or extra hazard, commercial occupancies such as banks, hotels, shopping malls, factories, refineries, chemical plants, etc. The recessed version of the Series TY-B Pendent Sprinkler, where applicable, is intended for use in areas with a finished ceiling. It uses a two-piece Style 10 (1/2 inch NPT) or Style 40 (3/4 inch NPT) Recessed Escutcheon. The Recessed Escutcheon provides 1/2 inch (12,7 mm) of recessed adjustment or up to 3/4 inch (19,1 mm) of total adjustment from the flush pendent position. The adjustment provided by the Recessed Escutcheon reduces the accuracy to which the fixed pipe drops to the sprinklers must be cut.

name: Sprinkler Upright 68* QR UL & FM
description:
Description

The Series TY-B, 2.8, 5.6, and 8.0 K-factor, Upright and Pendent Sprinklers described in this data sheet are standard response - standard coverage, decorative 5 mm glass bulb type spray sprinklers designed for use in light, ordinary, or extra hazard, commercial occupancies such as banks, hotels, shopping malls, factories, refineries, chemical plants, etc. The recessed version of the Series TY-B Pendent Sprinkler, where applicable, is intended for use in areas with a finished ceiling. It uses a two-piece Style 10 (1/2 inch NPT) or Style 40 (3/4 inch NPT) Recessed Escutcheon. The adjustment provided by the Recessed Escutcheon reduces the accuracy to which the fixed pipe drops to the sprinklers must be cut.

The adjustment provided by the Recessed Escutcheon reduces the accuracy to which the fixed pipe drops to the sprinklers must be cut.

description:
Description

Standard Response Spray Sprinklers are intended for use in the Sprinkler Systems designed in accordance with the standard installation rules recognized by the applicable listing or approval agency. They are available in Pendent Sidewall Styles.

Quick Response Spray Sprinklers are designed with a 3mm glass-bulb to react quicker at the specified temperature They are available in Pendent, Upright, Horizontal Sidewall Styles.

During a fire condition, the thermal-sensitive liquid in the Glass Bulb expands, causing the bulb to shatter, releasing the button and spring seal assembly Water flowing through the Sprinkler orifice strikes the Sprinkler deflector, forming a uniform spray pattern to extinguish or control the fire.

name: E-fencing
description:
Wall Top Electric Fence

The electric fence which is installed on the top of the wall.
Poles can be of below manner as per requirement:
Straight.
Angular.
Round Bar.
Square Tube.
Electric fence should not be installed on top of wall if the wall is lower than 1.5m.

Free Standing Electric Fence:

When there is no wall for fixing fence post then free stand configuration for electric fence is used. In this type of configuration fence post are grouted in the ground. A free stand fence is generally of 2.4m height from the ground level and runs parallel to chain mesh passive fence.
The height of fence can be customized as per requirement.
This type of configuration is mostly used in Farms for Animal control.

name: Electric Fence
description:
Key Components of an Electric Fence
a) Energizer : The heart of an electric fence system is the energizer, also known as the fence charger. It converts power from a mains source or a battery into short but potent pulses of electricity. Energizers are available in various sizes and power options to suit different requirements.

b) Insulators : Insulators are used to support the electrified wires and prevent them from contacting conductive materials, such as fence posts or trees. They ensure that the electric current remains confined to the wires, enhancing the fence's overall efficiency.

c) Wires : Electric fences typically consist of multiple wires, usually made of high-tensile steel or aluminum. These wires are strategically placed at different heights to create a barrier that is difficult to breach. The number and spacing of wires can be adjusted based on the specific security needs.

d) Posts : Fence posts are essential for providing support and structure to the electric fence. They can be made of wood, metal, or plastic, depending on the desired durability and conductivity.

e) Grounding : Proper grounding is critical for an electric fence to function effectively. Grounding rods are buried in the ground near the fence, providing a path for the electric current to complete its circuit. This ensures a consistent and reliable electrical pulse throughout the fence.

name: Laser Fence Security
description:
Features
There are a number of products by Optex India in their REDWALL range for laser fencing. The main features of these products are as follows:

30m radius for 190 degrees range
Vertical and horizontal mounting
Unique detection algorithm
Form C master alarm output
Automatic area setting function
Environmental disqualification circuit
The scene selection (Outdoor, Indoor, Indoor Ceiling/Wall protection, and Vehicle)

Analog (Dry contact) & IP connection

name: Laser Fence System
description:
LFS is used to detect intrusion within defined boundaries. It is an active optical fencing system, which uses invisible laser radiation. Interception of radiation due to intrusion is sensed by optical receiver to generate alarm signal. An imaging device can also be integrated with this system for intrusion recording.
Features:
Continuous Invisible Laser Fence
Day and night operation (24×7)
Event Triggered video recording
Low False Alarm Rate
IP enabled LAN connectivity

name: Road Blocker
description:
Road blockers play a critical role in security systems, providing an effective solution for preventing unauthorized vehicle access. These barriers, often made of reinforced steel, are strategically installed at entry and exit points of sensitive areas such as government buildings, military bases, airports, and industrial complexes. Integrated into a broader security network, road blockers enhance protection by stopping vehicle-borne threats.

High Impact Resistance
Environmental Resistance
Customized Installation
Hydraulic Operation Mechanism

name: Tyre Killer
description:
The primary function of a Tyre Killer in a security system is to restrict unauthorized vehicle access. By deploying sharp spikes, it punctures the tires of vehicles attempting to enter restricted areas, rendering them immobile. This effective barrier serves as a strong deterrent, ensuring enhanced security in high-risk locations like military bases, airports, and government facilities

Material: Heavy-Duty Steel
Effective Tyre Puncture
Fast Operation Time
Environmental Resistance

name: Area Scan UVSS
description:
High resolution imaging, output 4096P color images
Real time imaging, scanned parts of chassis will show up on display in real time
Support vehicles with different height of chassis, no limitation for vehicle length
Embedded bi-directional triggers, support bi-directional scan
Bi-directional LPR function can capture and recognize both front and rear license plate
Designed to withstand harsh environments

name: Portable Scan UVSS
description:
Embedded bi-directional trigger, can achieve bi-directional scan without any external trigger like loop sensors
Front end embedded imaging algorithm detect vehicle direction automatically, not affected by external triggers, make it easy for engineering works
Real-time uploading images
4K color images
Have uni-vision software, easy to use, suit for portable product
Have pro-vision software, which is server-client structure, can have multiple client and can support multiple scanner

ANPR Camera
The software of the Portable Scan UVSS provides a flexible and efficient under-vehicle inspection solution. Designed for quick deployment, it captures high-resolution images of a vehicle’s undercarriage, using advanced image processing for thorough analysis.

name: Dual Scan UVSS
description:
Dual mode scanner, generate area scan image and linear scan image simultaneously
High resolution imaging, output 4096P color images. Real time imaging, scanned parts of chassis will show up on display in real time
Support vehicles with different height of chassis, no limitation for vehicle length
Embedded bi-directional triggers, support bi-directional scan. Bi-directional LPR function can capture and recognize both front and rear license plate
Built rugged with stainless steel, designed to withstand harsh environments
Provides all kinds of ISP functions, such as Brightness adjust, Saturation, Color Balance etc

ANPR Camera
Dual Scan UVSS software offers cutting-edge under-vehicle surveillance with dual-camera technology for comprehensive scanning. It captures high-resolution images of a vehicle’s undercarriage, enabling precise inspection in real-time. The software is equipped with advanced image processing and comparison features, detecting anomalies or foreign objects with exceptional accuracy.

name: Linear Scan UVSS
description:
Auto digital line scan, high-resolution undercarriage imaging
Decision Response Time: 2-3 seconds
Applicable to variety of vehicles, wide vision
Test will be completed during the vehicle maneuvers without stopping, adapted to different speed
Undercarriage image can be stored, retrieved, searched or compared with other images
Whole image display ion monitor, can zoom, playback, sign in the images, stretching and cutting, etc

ANPR Camera
The software of the Linear Scan UVSS offers precise and efficient under-vehicle inspection by capturing detailed, high-resolution images of a vehicle’s undercarriage. Utilizing advanced image processing algorithms, it analyzes and detects anomalies such as hidden explosives or contraband

AC loss detection and AC loss delay reporting.

name: CHG-120
description:

Charges sealed lead-acid batteries
Automatic float-type battery charger
Rated for batteries of 25 to 120 ampere-hours
Obtains full float voltage within 48 hours
AC Fail delay (central station applications) per latest NFPA requirements

name: CHG-75
description:

120 VAC or 220/240 VAC operation
Rated for batteries 25 to 75 AH
Screw terminal connections for battery, battery backup to other equipment and SLC loop

name: APS2-6R
description:

UL 864 Ninth Edition compliant
Lightweight, compact design
120 or 220/240 VAC (@ 50/60 Hz) versions
Output circuits with overload protection
Built-in “brown-out” circuitry

name:
ELSA CONTROL PANEL
3L-TP/12 (12.1 Inch Touch Panel)
description:
FEATURES & BENEFITS:

Pin-Point Leak Location Precisely, tolerance +/-1m. (Indication by RED DOT)
History/Event Log: 5,000 events.
“Freezing” of selected zone(s) during maintenance/repair and no-fault message generated.
Readily connect to GSM modem / dialer for SMS fault notification.
Modbus/TCP option available.
Ability to Zoom-In onto each floor plan.
Varies sizes of LCD monitor available upon request.

name:
ELSA CONTROL PANEL
3L-SP/DP - Supervising Panel
description:
FEATURES & BENEFITS:

Monitor up to 99 units (external): (Either 3L-AP or 3L-DP or 3L-NDP.)
Max. accumulated length: sensing cable up to 20,000m (200m x 100)
LCD display: 4 lines English characters. Each zone is programmable by software (up to 35 characters)
Event –Log (896 time-stamped events stored)
Failed-Safe Loop Back Feature (class A wiring system): Continue to detect leak if there is a cable break.
Sensitivity can be adjusted manually.
Communication interface with BMS/EMS.
2 x Dry contact relay for leaks.
2x Dry contact relay for cable-break.
High Level interface protocol: RS485/Modbus

name:
ELSA CONTROL PANEL
3L-AP – Locating Panel
description:
FEATURES & BENEFITS:

Connect up to 192m (4-20mA) or 200m (RS485) of sensing cable and 300m of jumper cable.
Precision of Leak Location: +/- 1m
LCD display – 2 x 14 characters to display leaked location and cable break.
Continue to detect leak if there is a cable break > Failed-Safe Loop Back Feature (class A wiring system).
Sensitivity can be adjusted manually.
3x Dry contact relays > 2 x leaks and 1x cable-break signals out.

name:
ELSA CONTROL PANEL
3L- DP – Locating Module
description:
FEATURES & BENEFITS:

Connect up to 200m of sensing cable and 300m of jumper cable.
Precision of Leak Location: +/- 1m
Continue to detect leak if there is a cable break Failed-Safe Loop Back Feature (class A wiring system)
RS485/Modbus (Open protocol)
1x Dry contact relay output for leak or cable-break.
Sensitivity can be adjusted easily at site.

Optional Features:

Connect 3L-DP directly to 3L-SP or EMS/BMS with sensing cables to monitor large areas or multiple floors.

name:
ELSA CONTROL PANEL
3L-NDP – Locating Panel
description:
FEATURES & BENEFITS:

Maximum accumulated length of sensing cable: 10m
Maximum accumulated length of jumper cable: 300m
Failsafe Operation: Ability to operate in loop installation Ability to detect/locate liquid leakage during cable break.
Time to detect Leak/Cablebreak: 3 seconds typical.
Liquid leak detection data: Typically, 20mm in length of liquid (such as tap water) in full contact with sensing cable, leak sensitivity is adjustable.
Multi-leak detection and location capability.
Remote supervision by RS-485 Modbus.
ASIC-based digital location principle (patent pending) with inherent temperature stability, zero-drift and very low power consumption.

name:
ELSA CONTROL PANEL
3L-NP – Non-Locating Module
description:
FEATURES & BENEFITS:

S1+S2+…+Sn <=6 0m
J1+ J2+…+ Jn <=1 00m
Sensitivity can be adjusted manually.
1x Dry contact relay output for leak or cable-break
Typical Application
To monitor small room area (typically 20sqm)
where leak can be located easily such as Pantry room, drip trays.

name: Sensing Cable 3L-LS
description:
FEATURES & BENEFITS:

Application: Water and slightly-corrosive conductive liquids.
Diameter size: 6mm average.
Continuity wires: White & Red insulated with flame-retardant polymer.
Sensing wires: 2 x Black wires, semi-conductive polymer.
Carrier: Flame-retardant polymer material with greenish color in high visibility.
Fire resistance: non-flame propagating and self-extinguishing.

name: Sensing Cable 3L-AS
description:
FEATURES & BENEFITS:

Application: Highly-corrosive conductive liquids such as 100% Sulfuric Acid.
Diameter size: 6mm average.
Continuity wires: White & Red insulated with fire-resistant fluoropolymer.
Sensing wires: 2 x Black wires, semi-conductive fire-resistant fluoropolymer.
Carrier: Fire-resistant fluoropolymer material with yellowish color in high visibility.
Fire resistance: UL910 (NFPA 262), highest Fire/Smoke standard.
